Articles.Content:
Hi!

As the title (should) indicate, I have found a book written by Hadfield at my local library(for the anecdote: I decided to read it when I saw it was written by Hadfield).

I haven't finished it yet, but so far it's pretty interesting!

Here's the link(if you are interested): http://chrishadfield.ca

Just something I wanted to share with you
Heard about this a few weeks ago. I've been meaning to check it out myself.
